input.sentences: the scenery was too beautiful not to capture here .
he was really looking forward to this place .
the water felt so soothing and the air was clear .
the waterfall was awesome . it was his favorite place .
it felt very existential to be here .
output.sentences: The sun is shining, and the water is calm.
I can gently hear the waves hitting the rocks.
I'm listing to this as I'm working in my office.
I think about the vacation from last week when we went kayaking down the river.
After kayaking, we hiked up the mountain and looked at the scenery.
